column4: they all have /bin/sh on my relatively-new install. Presumably, PAM stops disabled accounts from logging in.
ah, seemed a bit strange, thanks
does admin or daemon have a password? seems a silly question I know :) etc/shadow does have passwords for them, and I'm dist-upgrading and can't remember if I had to add them for something
'admin' is not a user account on my system. 'daemon' is disabled (the password hash is *)
